activities.name: Free Clinic Volunteer
activities.description: Provided support to underserved patients at community health clinic, translating for Spanish-speaking patients
activities.impact: Assisted over 200 patients annually, improved clinic efficiency by 25%

activities.name: Youth Mentorship Program
activities.description: Mentored middle school students from underrepresented backgrounds in STEM subjects
activities.impact: 15 of my 20 mentees advanced to honors science courses in high school

activities.name: School Debate Team
activities.description: Led team to state championships, specialized in policy debate on healthcare reform
activities.impact: Team ranked #2 in state, won 3 regional tournaments

core_values.description: Believe everyone deserves access to quality healthcare regardless of socioeconomic status
Committed to lifting up the next generation, especially underrepresented students in STEM
Using my multilingual skills and cultural awareness to connect diverse communities

defining_moments.title: Witnessing Healthcare Disparities at the Free Clinic
defining_moments.description: Working at the free clinic, I saw patients who delayed seeking care due to cost, language barriers, or distrust of the medical system. One elderly woman came in with advanced diabetes complications that could have been prevented with earlier intervention. This experience crystallized my commitment to addressing healthcare inequity.
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Felt anger at systemic inequities, then determination to be part of the solution
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Healthcare is a human right, and addressing disparities requires both systemic change and individual commitment

defining_moments.title: Helping My Mentee Overcome Academic Struggles
defining_moments.description: Marcus, one of my middle school mentees, was failing science due to lack of confidence and support at home. I spent extra time working with him, connecting science to his interests in music and sports. Seeing him eventually make honor roll taught me the power of believing in someone's potential.
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Frustrated initially, then overjoyed at his transformation and success
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Sometimes the most important thing you can give someone is belief in their abilities

defining_moments.title: Leading Debate on Healthcare Reform
defining_moments.description: When our debate team tackled healthcare policy, I drew on my clinic experience to bring real stories to policy arguments. However, I learned that winning debates isn't just about facts—it's about making judges feel the human impact of policy decisions.
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Passionate about the topic, then strategic about effective communication
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Personal experience combined with rigorous research creates the most compelling arguments

model_extra.essay_prompt: How do you hope to use your Harvard education in the future?

essay_prompt: How do you hope to use your Harvard education in the future?
